alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 01 at 3:37PM CST until February 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 25 below to 35 below zero. Locally lower wind chill values possible. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Marshall, Roberts and Grant Counties. In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Periods of blowing snow will continue to produce significantly reduced visibility at times this afternoon, as low as one eighth of a mile, on area roads across far northeast South Dakota and western Minnesota. Expect the late afternoon commute to be impacted. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
